name: Spacial Anchor
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature is locked either to your position or to their current location. You must choose one effect upon casting the spell. At the start of each of your turns, if the creature has moved, it is teleported either adjacent to you or to its original point, optionally taking 3d10 damage that can't be reduced or negated.

After a creature is teleported this way, it can choose to make a Willpower saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
